name: Digital Limelight
tag_list: search, consumer-web, ecommerce, games, entertainment, virtual-reality, media, identity, music, mobile, software, 3d-imaging, advertising
overview:
Digital Limelight’s historic launch with over two dozen next generation product lines across twelve industries will move the web from Web 2.0 to Web 3.0 and provide a credible threat to Google’s search dominance.

Using its newly created Hydra Startup Business Model of simultaneously launching innovative product lines across numerous industries, Digital Limelight is not only revolutionizing the tech startup model but the Web itself by simultaneously advancing the digital product categories of search interfaces, personal imaging, digital identities, software interfaces, gaming characters, virtual spaces, music presentation, web design, high end computers, and content review to name just a few. As a group, these never-before-seen products in a dozen industries provide the foundation of Web 3.0. As a totality, these Web 3.0 products also provide the consumer with a true â€œhigh end digital lifestyleâ€ through products that range from more advanced search interfaces than Google to more dynamic digital addresses than DotComs to more realistic imaging than your local photographer.
